explains: adv. 不可逆转地，不可阻挡地

sentences.en: Spending on health is growing inexorably.
sentences.cn: 健康上的花费在不可阻挡地增加。

sentences.en: A world war will leave only smoldering ashes as mute testimony of a human race whose folly led inexorably to ultimate death.
sentences.cn: 一场世界大战所留下的只是闷燃的灰烬，无声地证明了人类的愚蠢，最终无情地走向死亡。
通货膨胀使物价节节上涨。
